channel.title: [pi] Slayer Help
channel.description: Hey, when i talk to Duradel, it shows nothing, i tried looking into other sources to try to fix it, but it would'nt work, how do i make it so when i click on him, it says, do you want a new task or something like that.

item.title: [pi] Slayer Help
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

go to actionhandler.java

search for firstclicknpc + add in code to make him create a new slayer task.

EAZY BRO

need help? add jake__2008@hotmail.co.uk on msn

Read full topic
